snippet: The outbreak of the disease appears to have been contained halfway through an emergency vaccination effort for millions of children in the Middle East.
abstract: First polio outbreak in Syria in 14 years, which caused alarm when detected in September 2013, appears to have been partially contained through emergency vaccination effort; officials warn disease has not been eradicated and will likely return in spring.
lead_paragraph: The outbreak of the disease appears to have been contained halfway through an emergency vaccination effort for millions of children in the Middle East.

headline.main: Polio Vaccination Effort in Syria Appears to Have Some Effect
headline.print_headline: Gains Seen In Fighting Polio in Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
